name: form-extractor-systematic-review
description: A full-stack application for extracting and processing forms in systematic reviews

scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run client:test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run server:lint && npm run client:lint
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:server && npm run deploy:client
scripts.deploy:server: echo 'Deploy server to your preferred hosting service'
scripts.deploy:client: echo 'Deploy client to your preferred hosting service'

author: Matheus Rech
